Keywords: Asgardian , Future , Mystical , Past
Real Name: Loki Laufeyson
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) THE TESSERACT: Loki starts the game with the Disney+ #s006 Tesseract equipped.
I CAST A PROJECTION OF MYSELF SO REAL, EVEN THE MAD TITAN BELIEVED IT: Shape Change. // If Loki would be the first friendly character to be KO'd this game, you may instead replace him with another character named Loki from your Sideline that is equal or less points than Loki on its starting click. // SIDELINE ACTIVE - Once per game, if another character named Loki is the last friendly character on your force while this Loki is on your Sideline, when that character would be KO'd you may instead replace it with this Loki on click #1.
GLORIOUS PURPOSE!: STOP. Barrier. When this click is first revealed, after resolutions you may place Loki up to 4 squares away from his current square, then generate up to 4 blocking terrain markers in squares within range. At the beginning of your turn, remove those markers even if this power is lost.
Trade Loki Want Loki

Comments
June 1, 2022
Bobcat2022
Yeah, no, you don't keep this guy on the Sideline unless you're running an all-Loki team. He's practically the best one! And that top-tier STOP click means he's unlikely to be the first on your force KO'd--even before you consider the Mystics, Shape Change, ESD, and longer-than-average range. So what you've actually got is a really solid Running Shot Pen/Psy + Outwit piece that's going to be trouble for your opponent if they do engage him or if they don't. That's a fun time no matter what your Sideline looks like.
May 4, 2022
Goop
I'm not sure if he's worth a sideline spot, the chances that the last character alive on your force is a loki is going to be pretty slim, unless you build for it. Otherwise he's a decent attacker with RS and Psyblast + Outwit. The +5 for tesseract is really only useful on his middle clicks when his attack/damage drops pretty low. I really like that STOP on last click that saves him and puts him on a great final click. Play him aggressively to make your opponent kill him first to get a free Loki in.
